SELECT id, sas_sun_mac_address, INET_NTOA(sas_sun_ip_address) AS sunIpAddress, sas_sun_port, sas_sun_alive_state, sas_last_updated FROM sun_alive_status WHERE sas_sun_mac_address = #{sunMacAddress}

SELECT id, sas_sun_mac_address, INET_NTOA(sas_sun_ip_address) AS sunIpAddress, sas_sun_port, sas_sun_alive_state, sas_last_updated FROM sun_alive_status WHERE sas_sun_ip_address = INET_ATON(#{ipAddress}) AND sas_sun_port = #{port}
ORDER BY sas_last_updated DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sun_alive_status (sas_sun_mac_address, sas_sun_ip_address, sas_sun_port, sas_sun_alive_state, sas_last_updated) VALUES (#{sunStatus.sunMacAddress},INET_ATON(#{sunStatus.sunIpAddress}),#{sunStatus.sunPort},#{sunStatus.sunStatus}, unix_timestamp(LOCALTIMESTAMP()))
